Package com.github.besherman.lifx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LFXAlarmCollection
    A collection of alarms for a light.
    LFXGroup
    A group of lights.
    LFXGroupCollection
    A collection of groups.
    LFXGroupCollectionListener
    Listener that get notified when a group is added or removed.
    LFXLight
    A bulb.
    LFXLightCollection
    A collection of lights.
    LFXLightCollectionListener
    A listener that gets informed when a light is added or removed.
    LFXLightDetails
    Detailed information about a light.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LFXAlarm
    Specifies an alarm for a light.
    LFXClient

    LFXInterfaceFirmware
    Interface firmware details.
    LFXInterfaceStat
    Interface status.
    LFXVersion
    Information about a specific product.
    LFXWaveform
    The color and waveform of a light.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description

    Power state of a group.
